heading: Sunday Night
text: Snow showers after midnight south of Route 4. Lows from near 10 and low teens in the northeast, and mid teens to near 20 elsewhere. Light and variable wind.

heading: Monday
text: Widespread snow spreading north to around route 2. Highest totals in the southeast and over the Greens. Accumulations range from 1-2 icnhes just south of the international border to 4-6 inches across the lower greens. Over half a foot possible in the Upper Valley. Highs from the upper 20s to low 30s. Northeast winds increasing to over 15 mph gusting to 25.

heading: Monday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Showers become scattered from west to east in the early evening. Snow showers diminishing south to north. Lows mainly in the teens, some single digits in the cold hollows in the north. Northwest winds remaining gusty, around 15 mph, gusting upto 30 mph.
